abstract: We shouldn't have been surprised that our most popular story on Twitter in the Sept. 25 issue was that on Mindy Kaling, who has more than 1.5 million followers.
snippet: We shouldn't have been surprised that our most popular story on Twitter in the Sept. 25 issue was that on Mindy Kaling, who has more than 1.5 million followers.
lead_paragraph: We shouldn't have been surprised that our most popular story on Twitter in the Sept. 25 issue was that on Mindy Kaling, who has more than 1.5 million followers. "With Tweets, if you are sitting around for more than 45 seconds, it's probably not the medium for you," the actress/writer told Curtis Sittenfeld.

headline.main: Mindy Kaling Takes the Twitter Prize
